original: Agrajñasūtra
analyzed: agrajñasūtra

original: Wal_1 bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ lokaḥ saṁvartate / saṁvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā satvā
analyzed: bhavati sa samayaḥ yat ayam lokaḥ savartate savartamāne loke yat bhūyasā satvā

original: ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadyante / te tatra bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ
analyzed: ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadyante te tatra bhavanti rūpiṇaḥ manaḥ mayāḥ avikalāḥ ahīna indriyāḥ

original: sarvāṅgapratyaṁ gopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṁprabhā vaihāyasagāminaḥ prītibhakṣāḥ
analyzed: ga upetāḥ śubhāḥ varṇa sthāyinaḥ svayam prabhāḥ vaihāyasa gāminaḥ prīti bhakṣāḥ

original: prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṁ tiṣṭhanti /
analyzed: prīti āhārāḥ dīrgha āyuṣaḥ dīrgham adhvānam tiṣṭhanti

original: Wal_2 tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ekodikā bhavati ekārṇavā / tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ
analyzed: tena khalu samayena mahā pṛthivī ekodikā bhavati eka arṇavā tasyām ekodikāyām mahā pṛthivyā

original: ekārṇavāyāṁ vāyunā śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti tadyathā pakvasya kṣīrasya śaraḥ
analyzed: ekārṇavāyām vāyunā śaraḥ sa mūrcchitaḥ satanoti tat yathā pakvasya kṣīrasya śaraḥ

original: saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoty evam eva tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ ekārṇavāyāṁ vayunā
analyzed: sa mūrcchitaḥ satanoti evam eva tasyām eka udikāyām mahā pṛthivyām eka arṇavāyām vayunā

original: śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti / sa bhavati pṛthivīraso varṇasaṁpanno gandhasaṁpanno
analyzed: śaraḥ samūrcchitaḥ satanoti sa bhavati pṛthivī rasaḥ varṇa sapannaḥ gandha sapannaḥ

original: rasasaṁpannaḥ / tadyathā navanītam evaṁvarṇaḥ / tadyathā kṣaudraṁ madhv aneḍakam evamāsvādaḥ /
analyzed: rasa sapannaḥ tat yathā navanītam eva varṇaḥ tat yathā kṣaudram madhu an eḍakam evam āsvādaḥ

original: Wal_3 bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ loko vivartate / vivartamāne loke satvā āyuḥkṣayāt karmakṣayāt
analyzed: bhavati sa samayaḥ yat ayam lokaḥ vivartate vivartamāne loke satvāḥ āyuḥ kṣayāt karma kṣayāt

original: puṇyakṣayād ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cavitvā ihatye manuṣyasabhāgatām āgaccanti / te
analyzed: puṇya kṣayāt ābhāsvarāt devanikāyāt cavitvā ihatye manuṣya sabhā gatām āgaccanti te

original: ’pi rūpiṇo pūrvavad yāvad dīrgham adhvānam tiṣṭhanti /
analyzed: pi rūpiṇo pūrvavat yāvat dīrgham adhvānam tiṣṭhanti

original: Wal_4 tena khalu samayena na sūryacandramasau prajñāyete na rātridivasaṁ na māsaṁ ardhamāsaṁ
analyzed: tena khalu samayena na sūrya candramasau prajñāyete na rātri divasam na māsam ardha māsa

original: na ṛtuṁ na kṣaṇalavamuhūrtaṁ prajñāyante … na strī na pumān / satvaḥ satva ity ekasaṁkhyāṁ gacchati /
analyzed: na ṛtum na kṣaṇa lava muhūrtam prajñāyante na strī na pumān satvaḥ satvaḥ iti eka sakhyām gacchati

original: Wal_5 athānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ satvaḥ aṁgulyagreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayati / yathā yathāsvādayati
analyzed: atha anyatamaḥ lolupa jātīyaḥ satvaḥ aguli agreṇa pṛthivī rasam āsvādayati yathā yathā āsvādayati

original: tathā tathā pratikāṁkṣati / yathā yathā pratikāṁkṣati tathā tathā kabaḍiṁkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktaḥ /
analyzed: tathā tathā pratikākṣati yathā yathā pratikākṣati tathā tathā kabaḍikāra upakrameṇa praparibhuktaḥ

original: Wal_6 adrākṣur anyatame satvās taṁ satvaṁ kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa pṛthivīrasaṁ paribhuñjānam /
analyzed: adrākṣuḥ anyatame satvāḥ tam satvam kabaḍiṅkāra upakrameṇa pṛthivī rasam paribhuñjānam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca te ’pi satvā aṁgulyāgreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayanti / yathā yathāsvādayanti
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca te pi satvāḥ agulyā agreṇa pṛthivī rasam āsvādayanti yathā yathā āsvādayanti

original: pūrvavad yāvad kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktāḥ / yataś ca te satvā taṁ pṛthivīrasaṁ
analyzed: pūrvavat yāvat kabaḍiṅkāra upakrameṇa praparibhuktāḥ yatas ca te satvā tam pṛthivī rasa

original: kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktās teṣāṁ kāye dṛḍhatvaṁ gurutvaṁ prajñāyete śubhavarṇo
analyzed: kabaḍiṅkāra upakrameṇa praparibhuktāḥ teṣām kāye dṛḍha tvam guru tvam prajñāyete śubhavarṇo

original: ’ntarhitaḥ / andhakāro loke prādurbhūtaḥ /
analyzed: ntarhitaḥ andhakāraḥ loke prādurbhūtaḥ

original: Wal_7 dharmatā khalu vāsiṣṭha andhakārasya loke prādurbhāvāt sūryacandramasau prajñāyete etc. as in 4.
analyzed: khalu vāsiṣṭha andhakārasya loke prādurbhāvāt sūrya candramasau prajñāyete etc as in
